publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2879 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Membership—That the Parliament agrees that— Keith Brown be appointed to replace Gil Paterson as a member of the European and External Relations Committee; Gil Paterson be appointed to replace Keith Brown and Aileen Campbell be appointed to replace Christina McKelvie as members of the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee; Bob Doris be appointed to replace Gil Paterson as a member of the Subordinate Legislation Committee.
